document.docAuthor: Assis, José Eriberto De, Alonso, Carmen & Christoffersen, Martin Lindsey
document.masterDocTitle: A catalogue and taxonomic keys of the Subfamily Nicomachinae (Polychaeta: Maldanidae) of the world

subSubSection.paragraph: Geographic distribution: Antarctic ; North Atlantic; North West Pacific from Japan to Bering Sea; North East pacific from California to Canada ; Arctic.

15 .
Nicomache (Nicomache) minor (
Arwidsson, 1907
)
: 100–104 , pl. 2 , figs. 68–73 , pl. 8 , figs. 252–256 ; Type : NSMT St. 1 ( 2 ), St. 6 ( 4 ), St. 7 ( 26 ). Type locality: Norway .

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
N. (Nicomache) minor :
Uschakov 1955
: 338
, fig. 124 ;
Imajima and Shiraki 1982
: 39
, figs. 16 a–m;

: 20
, fig. 5 a–h;
Imajima 1992
: 130
; 1994 : 119 ;
De Assis et al. 2007
: 29
, tab. 1 .

subSubSection.paragraph: Geographic distribution: Norway ; Japan ; Okhotsk Sea, Russian; Bering Sea.

Remarks:
Pettibone ( 1954 )
considered this species to be a synonym of
N. personata
Johnson, 1901
. However,
Imajima and Shiraki ( 1982 )
reported this species from Japan , and
Lee and Paik ( 1986 )
reported it from Korea . These authors furnish detailed descriptions and illustrations, leading us to accept the validity of the original species.
